text: Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.
Right hand of the Ice Queen
Often the most dangerous assault comes from the enemy you least expect.
Fear the might of the Storm!
Only those who are adept at swordsmanship and stealth are permitted to be Rangers in Asrai society.
Years of stalking the despised Ratmen has made Ceridan a feared individual amongst Skavendom. Ceridan often shares his experiences around campfires to any who would listen.
Ceridan was born with natural affinity towards hunting and swordplay, a valuable trait for any aspiring Rangers.

Ceridan prefers to work alone as he believes himself to be most efficient when he doesn’t have to worry about others. Like the time he spent in the black Mountains, gathering information to use against the Skaven.
Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar to the Empire, relaying messages from the High King Grudgebearer to Emperor Franz.
With his unnatural gift of persuasion, Engrol can twist any situation to be of benefit to his lords and allies.
Engrol is famous for striking lucrative trade deals where even the most experienced businessmen have failed.
Engrol’s bodyguard are fierce warriors who are completely loyal and will protect him in battle to the very last.
Engrol’s skills in diplomacy are unnaturally proficient for a Dwarf and he has resolved many quarrels with the Empire in his career spanning over two centuries.
The steam tank Ignis Draconis was the first tank built by Leonardo of Miragliano.
The steam tank Ignis Draconis was the first tank built by Leonardo of Miragliano.
This one is well-versed in the various court intrigues of the Asur, which is something of an advantage in matters of diplomacy.
The Realms of Man must not fall.
He is well known enough to them to gain access to certain high-caste individuals.
This kind of spell is nothing to the Vladimir
Deadliest tip arrow can ever have

Vladimir Stormbringer can harness the power of blizzards to enhance the speed of his troops. With a wave of his hand, he summons a freezing storm that swirls around his army, reducing the drag on their movements and allowing them to cover ground with ease. The biting winds of the blizzard invigorate the troops, filling them with an icy determination to reach their destination quickly. With this skill, Vladimir's troops can move at a rapid pace, cutting through snowdrifts and icy terrain to outflank their enemies and seize key positions.
Vladimir creates a shield of wind and lightning that deflects blows and stuns foes who try to breach it. This skill allows Vladimir and his troops to weather savage attacks and regroup.
Vladimir channels the power of the storm to shorten his spell cooldown time, allowing him to cast his spells more frequently to harness the enemy
His stubborn anger will see nothing stop him.
Just with a mere thought, he can manipulate the flames to burn even hotter and longer, while requiring less of his own energy to sustain it.
The wind flows through me. It controls me!
Against the undead, Luther's fills the mens hearts with fire and light!
Stand firm men, that which is dead may still burn.
His spells are like infernos, leaving nothing but ash and cinders in their wake. His enemies quickly learn to fear the searing heat of his magic.
Nothing is beyond that of which he dreams, with old hands he deftly put to fruition his machinations.

This splendid elven sword contains a piece of rune crystal attached to the shaft. It has magical properties that detect the presence of dwarves and in doing so sharpen the blade to double its fineness, giving the welder more destructive potential.
Bright and angry glow the Runes of Fury, the weapons that hold them almost jumping out of their wielders' hands in desperation to strike the foe.
A Dwarf wielding a weapon bearing the Runes of Might can fell a Giant in a flurry of axe blows.
A weapon with this rune moves to block incoming attacks, making its wielder extremely hard to hit.
The Rune of Striking causes the weapon to hit the foe’s most vulnerable area with an uncanny precision.

Bestowed with unwavering power, Allor intervenes with his Amber magic to ensure the survival of Ceridan and Carlsson in their direst moments
He preserves life and restores vitality in the face of peril
Infused with Amber's might, Allor imparts reduced winds of magic costs and cooldowns, hastening spellcasting with unparalleled mastery
While Ludwig's steam tank is being repaired, he get in Nuln mechanical steed which was created by the greatest engineer Chaos Robie
A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

After fighting a mighty dragon and Greenskins together at Khaz Drakk, the Dragons Hall, Gotrek formed one of his many unlikely bonds. If Gotrek is by chance adventuring nearby he would always aid his old friends.
